dialog: John, may I introduce you to Charles Brown, our new manager at the airport.
Of course, how will I know him?
He's short, sturdy, and has light blonde hair.
Anything else I should look for?
If my memory serves me well, he has a mustache and fair skin.
How old is he?
He's in his late thirties.
I should have no trouble spotting him then. What time is his flight due?
It arrives at 2:30pm.
What can I get for you today?
I'd like to have a hamburger, please.
Would you like cheese on that?
No, thank you.
Would you like a drink as well?
Yes, a soda would be great.
What kind of soda would you like?
A Sprite would be fine, thank you.
Of course, no trouble at all.
I would also like a bag of chips, please.
Will that be all for you today?
